definition: noisy/cacophonous/to make noise/to disturb/to vent (feelings)/to fall ill/to have an attack (of sickness)/to go in (for some activity)/to joke

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Just in the evening fatty when suffering from diarrhea, he also quite not arrive where work to.
sentences.chinese: 只是晚上胖子在鬧肚子的時候，他也好不到哪裏去。

sentences.chinese: 你們這是否賣治鬧肚子的藥呢？
